title: Olá, mundo!
author: Labanatoin
cleaned_text: instiga-nos a mais a pontos, canais e meridianos que também circulam no corpo humano. A inspiração nessa similitude perfaz cada momento em que estivermos integrados riqueza e complexidade que albergam a perspectiva aqui, cientificamente evocada, anatomicamente vivida e integralmente experienciada na saúde humana. Just as rivers travel in the Earth body, the AnatoAcupuncture project encourages us to realize even more the anatomoclinical in the points, channels and meridians that also circulate in the human body. Inspiration in this similitude makes every moment in which we are integrated into the richness and complexity that harbor the perspective here, scientifically evoked, anatomically lived and fully experienced in health. joined 87 global organizations Complementary individuals deserve to have access to a broad array treatment options, including traditional, complementary, and integrative healthcare biomedical practices in a collaborative Help us support your patients even better by improving the future of healthcare—one that patient-centered all with the aim of improving bringing focus the TCIH Declaration today for a healthier future tomorrow. En diciembre de 2021 se lanzó una iniciativa legislativa popular dirigida a dar garantías jurídicas a la Medicina y a las terapias complementarias, tradicionales e integrativas. Para que la iniciativa se transforme en ley es necesario recoger 500.000 firmas en los próximos ocho meses. Los médicos antropósofos españoles apoyan esta iniciativa y hacen un llamamiento a firmar.
